creator: nishanthdirect@yahoo.co.in
text:
After submitting a http request Jmeter is showing response data in view result 
tree. but if we try to write the response data to a file, it is not writting. 
even though Jmeter is providing an option to save response data in the simple 
data writer.

creator: sebb@apache.org
text:
Works for me. Please provide more details. 

Note that the output is only saved during a test run - you can't save it after
the run has completed; you have to provide the file name *before* starting the test.
